Class MyNgramCounts

    NgramCounts

    public class MyNgramCounts
extends java.lang.Object
implements NgramCounts
    Class MyNgramCounts: class implmenting the interface NgramCounts.
    Author:
    N. Hernandez and S. Quiniou (2015)

    • Method Detail

      • setMaximalOrder

        private void setMaximalOrder(int order)
        Setter of the maximal order of the ngrams considered. In practice, the method will be called when parsing the training corpus, or when parsing the NgramCounts file (using the maximal n-gram length encountered).
        Parameters:
        order -

      • getMaximalOrder

        public int getMaximalOrder()
        Description copied from interface: NgramCounts
        Getter of the maximal order of the n-grams in the training corpus. A private method should be considered to set the value in the class implementing the interface. In practice, the set method will be called when parsing the training corpus, or when parsing the NgramCounts file (using the maximal n-gram length encountered).
        Specified by:
        getMaximalOrder in interface NgramCounts
        Returns:
        the maximal order of n-grams considered.

      • getNgramCounterSize

        public int getNgramCounterSize()
        Description copied from interface: NgramCounts
        Getter of the data structure which maps the n-grams to the counts and return the number of mapped n-grams.
        Specified by:
        getNgramCounterSize in interface NgramCounts
        Returns:
        the number of distinct n-grams.

      • getNgrams

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getNgrams()
        Description copied from interface: NgramCounts
        Getter of the data structure which maps the n-grams to the counts and return the set of n-grams present in the structure.
        Specified by:
        getNgrams in interface NgramCounts
        Returns:
        the set of distinct n-grams.

      • getCounts

        public int getCounts(java.lang.String ngram)
        Description copied from interface: NgramCounts
        Getter of the data structure which maps the n-grams to the counts and return the count of a particular n-gram. If the n-gram is not present, it should return zero.
        Specified by:
        getCounts in interface NgramCounts
        Returns:
        the count of the given n-gram.

      • incCounts

        public void incCounts(java.lang.String ngram)
        Description copied from interface: NgramCounts
        Method incrementing the count of the given n-gram. If the n-gram has never been seen before, then it sets the counts to 1, else increments the counts. The method is used when parsing a corpus file.
        Specified by:
        incCounts in interface NgramCounts

      • setCounts

        public void setCounts(java.lang.String ngram,
             int counts)
        Description copied from interface: NgramCounts
        Setter of the counts of the given n-gram to a given count value. The method is used when parsing a file containing previously saved n-gram counts.
        Specified by:
        setCounts in interface NgramCounts

      • scanTextString

        public void scanTextString(java.lang.String text,
                  int maximalOrder)
        Description copied from interface: NgramCounts
        Method loading the text given and scanning tit to count all the n-grams of each sentence.
        Specified by:
        scanTextString in interface NgramCounts

      • scanTextFile

        public void scanTextFile(java.lang.String filePath,
                int maximalOrder)
        Description copied from interface: NgramCounts
        Method loading the text contained in a specified file (corresponding to a training corpus) and scanning the text to count all the n-grams of each sentence.
        Specified by:
        scanTextFile in interface NgramCounts

      • writeNgramCountFile

        public void writeNgramCountFile(java.lang.String filePath)
        Description copied from interface: NgramCounts
        Method saving the current n-gram counts in a file. The file should contain one n-gram per line, each line being made of the n-gram and its count separated by a tabulation character '\t'.
        Specified by:
        writeNgramCountFile in interface NgramCounts

      • readNgramCountsFile

        public void readNgramCountsFile(java.lang.String filePath)
        Description copied from interface: NgramCounts
        Method reading the current n-gram counts from a file. The file should contain one n-gram per line, each line being made of the n-gram and its count separated by a tabulation character '\t'. The method should also set the maximum encountered n-gram length (i.e. the NgramCounts order).
        Specified by:
        readNgramCountsFile in interface NgramCounts
